info.title: Movie React API Client
info.description: API documentation for the Movie React API Client

post.description: Returns the user and a token

get.description: Returns the current user

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the user

get.description: Returns list of movies
Returns a single movie
Returns a list of trending movies
Returns a list of movies matching the search query
Returns a list of related movies
Returns a list of movies in a specific genre
Returns list of series
Returns a single series

get.summary: Get a season of a series
get.description: Returns a single season

get.summary: Get an episode of a series
get.description: Returns a single episode
Returns a list of trending series
Returns a list of series matching the search query
Returns a list of streaming links for a movie
Returns a list of streaming links for an episode
Proxies a stream to avoid CORS issues
Returns a list of download links for a movie or episode
Returns a list of alternative links for a broken link
Returns the user's watch history
Returns the user's continue watching list

post.description: Updates the watch progress for a movie or episode

delete.description: Removes an item from the user's watch history

post.description: Marks an item in the watch history as completed
